name: Countryside Ramble
description: A really nice walk in some very scenic countryside.

route.description: Follow the path to the fork and go left.
Cross the bridge and turn right.
The trail finishes at the end of the valley.

name: Woodland Walk
description: Lots of tall trees and bubbling streams. very calming hike.

route.description: The walk is one big loop. Just keep following the signs.
walk is one big loop. Just keep following the signs.
